xf:insert.origin: xxf:element('repeat-current', (xxf:attribute('position', $position), xxf:attribute('repeat-current-1', xxf:repeat-current()), xxf:attribute('repeat-current-2', xxf:repeat-current('my-repeat')), xxf:attribute('repeat-index-1', xxf:index()), xxf:attribute('repeat-index-2', index('my-repeat')), xxf:attribute('repeat-context-1', name(xxf:context('my-group'))), xxf:attribute('repeat-context-2', xxf:context('my-repeat')) ))

xf:output.value: xxf:format-message('At {2,time,short} on {2,date,long}, we detected {1,number,integer} spaceships on the planet {0}.', ('Mars', 3, xs:dateTime('2010-07-23T19:25:13-07:00')))
xxf:format-message('There {0,choice,0#are no files|1#is one file|1<are {0,number,integer} files}.', xs:integer(.))

xxf:control-values.xxf:control: At 7:25 PM on July 23, 2010, we detected 3 spaceships on the planet Mars.

xf:output.value: xxf:format-message('A {2,time,short} le {2,date,long}, nous avons détecté {1,number,integer} vaisseaux spatiaux sur la planète {0}.', ('Mars', 3, xs:dateTime('2010-07-23T19:25:13-07:00')))

xxf:control-values.xxf:control: A 19:25 le 23 juillet 2010, nous avons détecté 3 vaisseaux spatiaux sur la planète Mars.

xf:output.value: string-join(for $p in (xxf:repeat-position('repeat-department'), xxf:repeat-position(), xxf:repeat-position('repeat-employee')) return xs:string($p), '-')
